item.description:
Improvements

  • Cursor countdown now automatically cancels when "Pause for" is selected
  • More lenient streak logic - streak now breaks only when less than 75% of breaks are taken (previously broke after a single skip)
  • Version number in "About DeskRest" is now copyable
  • Video detection can now be ignored via menu bar to continue Focus Mode
  • Break reminder notification no longer persists to the next day

Bugfix

  • Fixed notification overlaying menu bar menu, which could make interactions difficult when notification is visible

View release preview on GitHub
